title: StormHawk
author: StormHawk
content: Is it true that scammers are now using AI technology to create videos online? Someone warned me about videos online that comes with links under them, he said the videos look so professional that are easier to confuse the eye, have anyone seen anything that looks like it? They can use any faces of real people in the video and you won't be able to tell the difference if they are fake or not.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: This is off topic or move it to board like serious discussion.Quote from: StormHawk on March 15, 2023, 09:47:54 AMIs it true that scammers are now using AI technology to create videos online? Someone warned me about videos online that comes with links under them, he said the videos look so professional that are easier to confuse the eye, have anyone seen anything that looks like it? They can use any faces of real people in the video and you won't be able to tell the difference if they are fake or not. I do not know the tools that are used for it, but it is possible.
